Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO RACING AND WAGERING

Title: Prohibits reversable withdrawals
Summary: Requires all withdrawal transactions made through a service provided by a mobile sports wagering licensee to be irreversible by the withdrawing consumer, the licensee or another at the consumer's request.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to prohibiting reversible withdrawals
